definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

pinyin: Xue3 fo2 long2 Shi2 you2 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: Until fairly recently, it seemed that Chevron would prevail.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，似乎雪佛龍公司將佔上風。

sentences.english: Chevron victory could become a powerful tool in fending off judgments in such cases.
sentences.chinese: 雪佛龍的勝利可以成爲抵擋此類案件的有力的工具。

sentences.english: There is another way, though, that Chevron is cheap, one that is more knowable.
sentences.chinese: 還有另外的辦法證明雪佛龍便宜，這個辦法更好懂。

sentences.english: For example, in 2009, Chevron's (CVX, news, msgs) drilling failure rate climbed to 35%.
sentences.chinese: 比如2009年，雪佛龍公司廢井率攀升到35%。
